messages.subject: The New Guy!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, How are you? I had stumbled upon your page as I was looking about some pages. So I joined. I really enjoy the history of The Samurai. I have many books
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
How are you? I had stumbled upon your page as I was looking about
some pages. So I joined. I really enjoy the history of The Samurai.
I have many books on the subject. I have a few contacts who are
authors. I am also involved in a historiacl re-enactment group. A
small group of us potray's a Japanese Shiro. We have great fun with
it. Again I just wanted to say hello and I llok forward to talking
to you all more!

Nagamori
